title: Jorgenson, Dygert Headline Team USA’s David vs. Goliath Olympic Road Race Showdown
content:
'We have a limited hand, but we have a pretty good hand': Team USA brings outsider hopes of disrupting the favorites to mine Olympic gold in this weekend's road races.

Read the full article at Jorgenson, Dygert Headline Team USA’s David vs. Goliath Olympic Road Race Showdown on Velo.
author: ahood
